title: Get 15 knives for the price of one — Cuisinart's block set is now 64 percent off
text:
Yahoo Lifestyle is committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. We may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

The creamy white handles on this Cuisinart set are simply riveting. (Photo: Amazon) More

Buying a good set of knives seems like a luxury—but it shouldn’t be.

Solid, sharp knives make cooking easier, faster and more of a pleasure. And we use them every day. Let us cut right to the chase: It’s time to swap your dull set for a new one.

We love the Cuisinart 15-Piece Culinary Block Set for many reasons: The handles are perfectly curved for a confident grip. The stainless steel rivets securing the blades to the handles are solid—and let’s not forget looks: With creamy white handles, these knives are chic and sophisticated and look amazing on a countertop.

Right now this set is 64 percent off, down from $160 to a mere $58. It’s tough to find even one good knife at that price—but with this deal you get 15!

“These are beautiful!” raves a fan. “They're so sharp and work wonderfully. I didn't realize how horrible mine where until I purchased these. They're a favorite of anyone who comes by for a visit. My parents loved the look, durability and sharpness and went out and bought the same ones.”

Says another: “I had some very nice culinary knives but my ex took them when he left (you know how that goes). I was worried that these would not be that great since they’re so inexpensive but they’re awesome! They look beautiful on my countertop. I chose the white and they’re so stylish. I think they also cut better than my culinary knives! I love these.”

Shop it: Cuisinart C77WTR-15P Triple Rivet Collection 15-Piece Cutlery Block Set, White, $58 (was $160), amazon.com

description: At an insane $102 off, this gorgeous knife set is a slice of heaven.
